lead_paragraph: While it was unclear whether Israel and Turkey made any progress in resolving their differences, the meeting created a potentially damaging rift within the Israeli government.
snippet: While it was unclear whether Israel and Turkey made any progress in resolving their differences, the meeting created a potentially damaging rift within the Israeli government.

headline.main: Turkish and Israeli Officials Meet Secretly on Raid Crisis
headline.print_headline: Turkish and Israeli Officials Meet Secretly on Raid Crisis
